channel.title: Lag Problem(Its really weird lag)
channel.description:
Ok. Ive been on lots of servers and ive seen servers with like 20 people on and no lag at all and they dont use a antilag. My server lags when more than 4 people log on. WTF's up with that?
I'm using Devolution so any tips on how to fix that would be helpful. :)
I deleted like all the useless NPC's and it still lags...
=[

its might just be the npcs but its not your computer i have 16mb of vitual memory :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: and mine can still rune a server

item.title: Lag Problem(Its really weird lag)
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

jcrane164:

Well then go buy a new computer or ram… Clean your computer out and it will prolly let you hold more… It’s just your computer truthfully, i had a piece of junk and it could hold 12 people and i went and got a new computer and now i can hold up to 75+ people. But my server’s will not run … They are all messed up But enough about me… Its either your computer or your source has loads of junk stuff on there… Or just to many npc’s and autospawned things

i got a 2.80 GHZ 512 MB ram

is that bad?

Read full topic

item.title: Lag Problem(Its really weird lag)
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

well if it is your server then it could be because your internet connection cannot support that many people, if it is not your server then it is the hosts connection that cannot support many people, if it runs fine with around 1-3 people playing it and it lags with more people playing it is your server or your internet connection, one way to tell if it is your connection is like if you try to go onto a game like WoW and it lags bad and not on RS then you know it is your connection if it doesnt lag bad on Wow then it is most likely your Server provider i hope this helped

Read full topic

item.description:
@kando2 wrote:

D D 3:

Lol you shouldn’t delete all the npc’s it is either your computer’s memory (meaning you don’t have a fast computer) or it is the person who is playing there computer is slow or you have alot of nulls?And do you should have antilag.java

I don’t agree with that. Private server are merely copyed from runescape with bad graphic’s and models. They not suppose to support more than 20+ members. The ones it dose are probally use’s dedicated to support it.
